kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Then the response status code should be 200
kw.sourcename: Then the response status code should be ${status_code}

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: And the response body should not be empty
Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

test.name: Scenario: Log in to Sauce Demo with Standard User

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'headless Chrome' to base url 'https://www.saucedemo.com/'.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Given Im on the main application page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: When I log in with credentials
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Then the page should contain the text "Products"
kw.sourcename: Then the page should contain the text "${expected_text}"

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Scenario: Log in to Sauce Demo with Locked Out User

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'headless Chrome' to base url 'https://www.saucedemo.com/'.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Given Im on the main application page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: When I log in with credentials
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then the locked out message should be displayed
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
